Posted By: Tim
I am just looking to get a sample of a T209 & T210 SGC 10 or A or even Raw(not really interested in any other grades or grading companies).  I just want to have an example of each for my collection and am not really particular (just to get an example I don't mind damage or even if it's cut in half and taped back together!) the only thing I'd like is to not pay a lot for just a sample card!  Hope you guys can help?!?
